texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: For those of you in the market for a cheap webcam for videoconferencing or home surveillance, the  Logitech C270  is hard to beat at about $20-25 USD. It can record video at 1280×960 and it's fairly good at low light levels. The white balance gets a bit off when it's bright in the room but hey — this camera is cheap.
texts.text: For those of you in the market for a cheap webcam for videoconferencing or home surveillance, the  Logitech C270  is hard to beat at about $20-25 USD. It can record video at 1280×960 and it's fairly good at low light levels. The white balance gets a bit off when it's bright in the room but hey — this camera is cheap.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: ZoneMinder  can monitor multiple cameras connected via USB or network. Setting up the C270 with ZoneMinder is relatively straightforward. (Getting ZoneMinder installed and running is well outside the scope of this post.)
texts.text: ZoneMinder  can monitor multiple cameras connected via USB or network. Setting up the C270 with ZoneMinder is relatively straightforward. (Getting ZoneMinder installed and running is well outside the scope of this post.)

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If a user wants to access the webcam in Linux, they must be in the video group. On my system, ZoneMinder runs as the apache user. I needed to add the apache user to the video group:
texts.text: If a user wants to access the webcam in Linux, they must be in the video group. On my system, ZoneMinder runs as the apache user. I needed to add the apache user to the video group:

texts.label: paragraph

texts.text: After clicking  Add New Monitor , here's the data for each tab:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Capture Method: Video For Linux version2
texts.text: Capture Method: Video For Linux version2

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The width and height settings are suggestions. You can crank them down to something like 640×480 if you'd like to save disk space or get a higher frame rate.
texts.text: The width and height settings are suggestions. You can crank them down to something like 640×480 if you'd like to save disk space or get a higher frame rate.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Once you save the configuration and the window disappears, you should see  /dev/video0 (0)  turn green in the ZoneMinder web interface. If it's red, there may be a different permissions issue to solve or your ZoneMinder instance might be running as a different user than you expected. If the text is yellow/orange, go back and check your camera configuration settings in the ZoneMinder interface.
texts.text: Once you save the configuration and the window disappears, you should see  /dev/video0 (0)  turn green in the ZoneMinder web interface. If it's red, there may be a different permissions issue to solve or your ZoneMinder instance might be running as a different user than you expected. If the text is yellow/orange, go back and check your camera configuration settings in the ZoneMinder interface.
